we chartered a plane to fly high above

literally picked their country apart
even before the earthquake deforestation
is left Haiti dangerously vulnerable to
natural disasters floods and mudslides
have killed more than 10,000 people in
the last four years the erosion of the
soil has crippled agriculture destroyed
much of the natural beauty of the
country and decimated its infrastructure
roads are washed out faster than they
can be rebuilt
most Haitians live half their life in
